subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets had a few positives this season — R. A. Dickey, David Wright and a no-hitter — but they finished 15 games under .500, and neither Dickey nor Wright is signed past 2013.
snippet: The Mets had a few positives this season — R. A. Dickey, David Wright and a no-hitter — but they finished 15 games under .500, and neither Dickey nor Wright is signed past 2013.
